title: PLANTING; SOWING; FERTILISING  (parts, details or accessories of agricultural machines or implements, in general A01B51/00 - A01B75/00)
informative_references: Combined with general working of soilSowing and fertilizing with aircraft - Apparatus for spreading sand or salt
glossary_of_terms: PlantAny of a kingdom (Plantae) of multicellular eukaryotic mostly photosynthetic organisms typically lacking locomotive movement or obvious nervous or sensory organs and possessing cellulose cell walls.

title: Apparatus, or methods of use thereof, for testing or treating seed, roots, or the like, prior to sowing or planting
informative_references: Chemicals for testing or treating seed, roots - Irradiation in generalSampling of (parts of) seeds for testing
definition_statement: This place covers: General methods and apparatuses for treating seeds, involving mechanical means.

informative_references: Germinating in preparation of malt

title: {Testing seeds for determining their viability or germination capacity}

definition_statement: This place covers: Testing, but not obtaining samples for testing, whereby the testing for viability is non-destructive.

title: Coating or dressing seed
informative_references: Artificial seedsChemical coating compositions for seeds
definition_statement: This place covers: Mechanical means/machines, e.g. nozzles, used for coating seeds or mechanical aspects of the coating.

title: {Regulating or dosing devices}
definition_statement: This place covers: Dosing or regulation of the fertilizer before reaching the rotating disks, i.e. dosing shutters and devices controlling the quantity and location of fertilizer falling onto the rotating disks.

title: {Devices controlling the quantity or the distribution pattern}
definition_statement: This place covers: Regulation of the fertilizer on or after the rotating disks, i.e. blades, chutes, plates for directing the flux of fertilizer, etc.

by a ground-engaging wheel
special_rules: Also when the driving depends on the forward speed of the machine in general, even if this is not derived from a ground engaging wheel.
